chat.title: Personal Introduction & Experience
chat.instruction: Please enter your personal information, education, work experience and other details. The more detailed the content, the more professional the generated resume will be.
chat.placeholder:
You can include the following information:
・Education (School, Major, Degree, Duration)
・Work Experience (Company, Position, Duration, Key Responsibilities and Achievements)
・Skills (Technical Skills, Language Abilities, Certifications)
・Project Experience (Project Name, Role, Achievements)
